author: theada.dao
title: Creating Cardano DAO Infrastructure
description: DAOs need toolsets for organizing, voting, and treasury to enable autonomous operation that can be used by DAO members to direct policy.
solution: ₳DAO will develop open-source tools for the Cardano blockchain that can be used by any organization seeking decentralized governance.
experience: ₳DAO includes experienced DeFi practitioners, software engineers, plutus pioneers, web/graphic designers, and policy experts.
